android-cloexec-creat.description:
Description

The usage of
creat()
is not recommended, itâ€™s better to use
open()
.

Examples:

int
fd
=
creat
(
path
,
mode
);
// becomes
int
fd
=
open
(
path
,
O_WRONLY
|
O_CREAT
|
O_TRUNC
|
O_CLOEXEC
,
mode
);
android-cloexec-creat.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
